attributes.action: Reward people of the UK, Frontline and Key workers with a “Longest Day Bonus” BH
attributes.additional_details:
In giving our people the opportunity to celebrate and come together we can mark an end to the worst being over and on the longest day of the year you can give us back the greatest opportunity to maximise our Reward. 
I leave it to better minds than I to name it! 
Thank you!
attributes.background: The great people of the UK sacrificed our Christmas and our Liberty for 2020. We deserve an opportunity to reward ourselves and thank the People who helped us to fight through Covid-19. Giving back the longest day (Mon 21 June) will allow maximum celebration & help Hospitality providers with a bonus

rejection.details: Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
